attributes.action: Remind the EU of the financial and moral obligation they owe the UK ..
attributes.additional_details:
WW2 costs for UK.
the Marshal Plan.
Casulty lista for UK and commenwelth troops in WW2
attributes.background: I 1940 Britain and her Commonwelth allies stood alone in order to fight European agresion. The UK took out huge loans to finance their WW2 efforts that took years to repay.  Now the EU want their decendants to pay to leave the EU  tell them no .

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/201568
